alert.note: Alert for Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Flood Statement issued January 09 at 12:44AM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT THROUGH 4 AM... WHAT...Minor flooding resulting from heavy rainfall. WHERE...Tutuila, Aunuu and Manua Islands WHEN...Through 4 AM IMPACTS...Heavy rainfall and runoff may cause elevated stream and drainage ditch levels. Ponding may occur on roads and low lying areas. Please take extra caution due to hazardous driving conditions. ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The Weather Service Office in Tafuna has recorded over half an inch of rainfall within the past 30 minutes. FAUTUAGA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA OFISA O LE TAU PAGO PAGO AS 1244 VAVEAO ASO GAFUA IANUARI 9 2023 ...UA IAI LE FAUTUAGA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA E OO I LE 4 I LE TAEAO NEI... MAFUAAGA...O lologa ma tafega e mafua mai timuga mamafa. NOFOAGA...Tutuila, Aunuu ma Manu`a TAIMI...Se`ia oo i le 4 i le taeao. AAFIAGA...O timuga mamafa ma tafega e faatupulaia ai le siisii vave o auvai. E ono tutupu ai lologa i luga o aualatele ma nofoaga aafia gofie. Faamolemole faaeteete i taimi e femalagaa`i ai i luga o auala. FA`AMATALAGA FA`AOPOOPO...Ua ova ma le afa inisi timuga na faamaumau e le Ofisa Vaai Tau i le 30 minute talu ai nei. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... Faamolemole, ia faaeteete i taimi e femalagaa`i ai i luga o auala. Aua ne`i savalia pe uia auvai ma aualatele o loo malosi ai tafega. E ono faatupula`ia sologa mai i mauga ona o le susu o le eleelee ua iai nei. Fa`amolemole, ia faautagia mai lenei fautuaga.
info.instruction: The public is advised to take necessary precautions when driving due to hazardous driving road conditions and flooded roadways. Do not cross fast flowing water in streams and on roads. Mud and landslides are also possible along steep and mountainous areas as grounds become saturated.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
